website_summaries.verdict: With several safety straps and plenty of color options for the fashion-forward pet owner, this airline approved carrier looks great, all while keeping Fluffy safe.
pros: Available in both small and large
bigger size houses pets up to 18 pounds
Side pockets hold treats and vet documents to have at the ready when flying
Folds for storage when not in use
cons: Buyers have reported that 1 of the sides tends to sink in during use, and would like the top's construction to be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the Advertised Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: This product IS NOT 17 x 10.2 x 11.2 inches (L x W x H) as the product description suggest. I just got it in the mail, thought it looked small, so I measured it. The length measures at 13", 4" shorter than advertised. It's a reall nice carrier and I'm irritated it's too small. Will be returning. I didn't opt for the "Large" size because it says it is 29.5" long, but now I'm curious as the the actual measurement.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No frame = no shape
customer_reviews.text: This has no frame so after it’s folded down for storage, the next time you use it, it’s completely caved in on your pet! My poor little Yorkies try to sit inside with it all smashed in on them. It was my first time buying a carrier so I learned the hard way (which now seems totally obvious)...do not buy a collapsible pet carrier that doesn’t have a metal foldable frame. I bought 2 and the same thing happened to both.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A sound investment for traveling with cats
customer_reviews.text: The photo says it all. Generally speaking, cats don’t like to travel, but we can at least provide them with a carrier they feel comfortable in. These kids snoozed the entire seven hour trip (instead of crying like they were dropped in a vat of acid), which is a first. Good for small to medium sized cats. The mesh is durable, the insert is washable, there is a storage pocket on the side, the straps are sturdy and the price is reasonable. I strongly recommend this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: K Z

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my 5 week old Maltese puppy (meaning ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is okay. It's the perfect size for my 5 week old Maltese puppy (meaning it fits him while also having some space), comes with a comfy bed that has a velcro strap underneath so it sticks onto the bag, and has a collapsable bowl. However, when it arrives, it is packed by folding, so when opening up it is not very sturdy nor will it keep its shape. It's a very nice looking bag that I have no shame of carrying outside, although I wish it had a better frame.
customer_reviews.author: Christ Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This sturdy, attractive case is the perfect size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy, attractive case is the perfect size for my Yorkie. He chewed through the cheap mesh in his last carrier after only 2-3 uses, so we had to replace it with this better quality case. I love the pocket for his leash and "poop bag" and the collapsible water/food dish is a thoughtful add-on that I haven't had with prior travel cases.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Worked out wonderfully for my very large Maine Coon
customer_reviews.text: The carrier worked great for my large Maine Coon. He had plenty of space and seemed comfortable in it. I like the small side zipper opening that allows you to pet and comfort your furbaby when you’re not able to let them out, but need to give them some reassurance. It’s a great product, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lissimore

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is significantly smaller than advertised :/ I'm glad I ordered it a few weeks before my trip because this would suck. It advertises as "Measures approximately 19.5x10.2x12" but the length is definitely a few inches off. The width and height are accurate enough but the length is not at all. I felt so bad even trying to convince my dog to get in there lol. I'm going to have to return it and get a different one. :/ If the length doesn't matter as much to you, then this will probably work fine. It feels well made. My dog is only 9-10 lbs on a good day and I don't think a much heavier dog would carry comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Better Sizing Would Be Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a 4 star just because the sizing listed is very confusing. I originally ordered a small based on the sizing but found it to be too small for my 9lb Shoodle. Returned that one and ordered the large - fits her perfectly! I love that it comes with a travel water bowl, the pockets it has, the name tag and how it will fit on top of other luggage - main reasons why I returned and ordered a larger size, saw others in store and the quality was not comparable to this one. Hopefully my puppy enjoys her flight to Florida in it
customer_reviews.author: PatsFan1621

customer_reviews.title: No need for a pricey doggy bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8.5 pound Maltese mix, she fit in it very nicely. I got it for airline travel (flew Alaska air) and it worked perfectly. The bottom is rigid and the detail of the zippers being able to buckle together is great -- in case she scratches at the side she can't make her escape. She would prefer to travel in her comfy, hard shell crate but for in-cabin travel it's simply too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: megcity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large cats, smalls dogs. Fits under seat in cabin flight
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded our expectations. We have a large 12lb cat and it gave him a ton of space for a very long flight and car ride during our relocation. He had lots of room and really came to like being in there. Comes with a collapsible silicone water cup too. Fit perfect under the seat in front of us on the airplane and has a removable (but velcros In) soft bed. It’s really great and I recommend for large cats and small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: My little Yorkie was comfortable and happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the carrier, used it for first time Christmas morning going to visit with my 2 month old Yorkie. I wanted to try it out before using it for vet visits. She seemed quite comfortable in it. My only concern is whether her sharp little teeth can tear the screened areas. Other than that, seems well made and I live that it came with a Sherpa mat for comfort and the collapsible water/food cup is a nice bonus. The straps are well made & he openings can be secured so zippers don't open. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Soft Cat Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, our cat really likes it. The carrier does not collapse on our Maine Coon cat while she is inside. The carrier has a nice fluffy pad/liner inside with a firm insert to make the bottom of the carrier straight. The carrier does collapse to store. It has a long strap that can be adjusted if necessary. Comes with a food/water dish and there is an attachment for a leash to hook into for safety. You can also run a car seatbelt through the front loops to secure it in the car. There are easy side entrances and there is a storage pouch on the front for food etc and there is a name tag.
customer_reviews.author: Omolope

customer_reviews.title: Love the grey and teal combo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I think my fur daughter does also. I just wish it stood up more and didn't sink so much at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Vanko

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than listed dimensions
customer_reviews.text: My 13lb goldendoodle did not fit in this "large" carrier. I measured him and at 19.5L I was sure this would work, but the dimensions are off. This carrier is MUCH smaller than advertised. Seemed to be ok quality, nothing outstanding. I also wish it had a top zipper. If you dog has long legs, he won't be able to stand up ever in this carrier since the top doesn't open, only the sides. Also, for dogs who aren't used to travel carriers, you can't place them inside this carrier easily from the side. Overall unhappy and returning.
customer_reviews.author: SharonT13

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Carriers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've purchased. We bought the first one when we were going to the shelter to pick up our little rescue kittens. Now that they're fully grown and much like robust small pumas, we needed a second one to transport them to and from any vet visits. These are safe, easy to handle and give great soft-but-strong breathability for our cats. They actually love them and (when not being used for transport) they like to sit and play in them. We are very happy with the quality and functionality of these travel carriers!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Valde

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10lb mini dachshund and she can fit perfectly inside with room to turn around. I've never flown with the carrier but I drive with it frequently. The seatbelt loops secure it into place and I have no worries of it moving. The only down side is the seatbelt does squeeze it a bit on the front panel. There's still plenty of room for the dog but I would like it to maintain its shape a little better. Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is very lightweight, yet well constructed. As you can see from the photo attached, it is plenty of room for our 11 pound Shih Tzu princess. The carrier also has padding and more than adequate ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: LeTU MBA

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  cat can bite and claw and tear through mesh with surprising ease!  this is not the carrier for a hell beast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great carrier with many fine features... unfortunately it did not work at all for my cat, as she was able to tear and bite through the mesh within 30 minutes of being in there. Thank goodness she didn't do that on the plane! BEWARE! I was able to salvage the carrier in a pinch by completely coating the mesh in duct tape on both sides, leaving just enough space for breathing air. It was a pain, but we got her from CA to NY. I recommend putting a high-quality, odor-absorbent pee pad in the bottom for long-distance travel!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Cuddy

customer_reviews.title: Structurally unsupported
customer_reviews.text: The top of the carrier is mostly mesh material, but nice. Unfortunately, there is no support to hold it up in position, and constantly colapses in on itself. In addition, it was smaller than expected for the size that we ordered. Our dog is a four month old "maltipoo", weighing five pounds. We took a long trip (two 8 hour days in one direction), and were not able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: boarbrook

customer_reviews.title: ... long from head to base of tail and fits comfortably.. Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that is25 inches long from head to base of tail and fits comfortably.. Great material
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Since our Chihuahua outgrew the smaller purse and is now SIX pounds, we went up to this carrier. Daisy loves it and never minds going in. We will leave it out prior to a trip and she runs in and out, laying down, knowing she will be traveling. It is just what we wanted... Thanks
customer_reviews.author: J L Craig

customer_reviews.title: This case works very well for in cabin.
customer_reviews.text: We have two little yorkies dogs. We bought this case because of the advertisement of airline approved but of course getting to the airport were told that they were too tall. we went back and forth with the agent because of the time crunch they let us fly anyway but were not happy with it. So does this work for yorkies yes is it airline approved that depends on the airline. I think the agents were cat people personal. But we are a dog family so screw you cat people.
customer_reviews.author: danithib

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier, my polydactyl could not tear it!
customer_reviews.text: Best carrier ive ever had. The silicone cups are convenient but they hold the smell of wet food. In terms of the carrier...fantastic. Durable, my polydactyl could not tear it while traveling cross country in the car. Double sided opening is very nice for getting them used to it. The top doesnt unzip but that may be part of flight regulations. Nice and comfy with solid bottom. Convenient accessory pouch. Like that you can attach leash inside carrier. Needed a little flexing from shipping but thats to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sensual Sojourn

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly flimsy. Can’t use the shoulder strap without it collapsing in on my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Otis loves his carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this carrier! I've used this carrier over two dozen times in the last 18 months. It looks brand new! For cleaning, the removable imitation sheepskin padding hand washes very easily and comes out like new. The carrier itself, I shower it off with hot water. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I frequently fly with my 6lb Chihuahua, and I was excited to get this bag, as it had an open view for her, it came with a luggage attachment, zipper lock and travel bowl. Sadly, I have yet to use it, as it dones not hold shape and it is uncomfortable for my dog. (side note: there was no travel bowl) I have tried to shape it and even tried stuffing with paper in an attempt to "fix" it, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Clinard

customer_reviews.title: my dog loved this carrier fits his 15lbs
customer_reviews.text: my dog loved this carrier fits his 15lbs, easy to carry and comfortable for him sturdy and well ventilated enough openings to get his treats to him.Easy for storing in the closets well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This carrier did the job admirably -- absolutely no problems with it. It already has a soft bottom liner but highly recommend you put an additional towel or something inside that your pet knows. I used a hand towel that my cat often napped on (it protected chair fabric from cat hair) and when I reached new house (we flew four hours from Dallas to Oregon), the cat continued to use the carrier as "home" while he explored his new surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Park

customer_reviews.title: Bella is ready for take off!
customer_reviews.text: This airline carrier is very well made. Zippers are sturdy. It's 12" high which is higher than most. Very well ventilated, mesh top, mesh on all four sides. Haven't traveled with it yet, so I'll update review when I get back. Bella is a 16 pound Malti-poo, 11 inches at the shoulder. She fits and can turn around. My vet recommended fitting a pee pad in the bottom. I can change the pad between flights so she has a clean, fresh bed! I attached pics. The bottom is stiff and will support her weight without much shifting. She goes in it without much fuss and that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shops

customer_reviews.title: I think my kitty actually likes it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carrier. It's sturdy, roomy and comfortable looking. But it's the opinion of my cat that matters most. The first time she got to use it was when she got spayed. I figured she would hate it forever after. She ended up playing and walking through it like a tunnel after we got home. I took her for a check up and had one of my shirts for her lay on inside. Maybe that helped her like it more but she sometimes naps in or near it now. Cat approved I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Magma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Made!
customer_reviews.text: I just received our two carriers for our cats. We purchased a large heather pink and a large heather lavender. They are truly well made, rugged and have nice soft little beds in them. One of our cats immediately went inside to check it out and laid down in it. I would say they are a hit! The little pop up water bowls are a fantastic bonus as well! Something I really like about them is the ability to fold them down when not in use. They take up much less space than a traditional hard plastic carrier. Thank you so much for making this quality product! Very satisfied customers here!! - Cathleen, Sweetie (female cat) and Jacob (male cat).
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Lengyel Wildlife Art

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Just in time!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new puppy and with the pandemic they get your pet from your car. They are on a busy road so I was afraid the puppy would jump out of their arms into the road!!! This came the day of her appointment and was perfect!! Nice n comfy she fell asleep in it on the way there!! I love it! So does she. She goes in it when it’s not in use too.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good product, as described.
customer_reviews.text: The puppy got comfortable with this travel carrier quickly. It isn't heavy, the airline accepted it, and there was no trouble with TSA. I wish it had a bigger side pocket so I could get some of my stuff in their and be able to keep my purse in my backpack. It also seems small - my 12 week old shih tzu will grow out of it soon and I had thought (after careful measuring) I would need just this one. Overall, it's a good product and is what was described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Fly’s off in style🌴
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Sugar my 20 year old cat loves it. She weighs 7.9 pounds and has room to lay down and turn around. She is going to St.Croix, USVI by plane so she needs everything perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Cat Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I used this carrier for my cat when traveling on the plane and it was great. Inside you can hook up you animal so that they can't run away and there is a fuzzy bed that you can take out. The reflectors were nice because, I felt like my cat was more safe. Really sturdy case that I still have and is in good condition. Defiantly should buy if traveling or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Elise S.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got the large
customer_reviews.text: We had to throw away our previous carrier when Kay got carsick in it with vomit and diarrhea. We haven't used this one yet but I love that it has tabs to safely secure to seat belt and there is a hook to attach to Kay so she doesn't run out, I love the color, the addition of the food/water bowl was great, there was also a little ID info card, the only thing I wish was that the side pockets would be a little wider so I could keep Kay's folder of all her Vet info in the Carrier (helps with our in case of emergency planning) but other than that I love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amita03

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This carrier was excellent in craftsmanship and design. It's nice and sturdy even with both doors unzipped and has a nice little peep-pocket on the side that can be unzipped to pet your animals without fear of it escaping. The clips on the zippers also give peace of mind that your pet cannot undo the zippers and escape. Unfortunately, this carrier was a bit too small for my pup, and I ended up giving it as a gift to my sister for her smaller cat (who loves it and sleeps in it all the time now on her own).
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Happy sleeping dog
customer_reviews.text: My jackchi loves it! And it has many ways to open on almost ever side to handle her. Has a buckle clip(2) that will clip onto belt for the car to keep dog from flying in car. Keeps her in place without sliding. And I like the reflective strip and that can also hold into place if you use a rolling bagto fit on top of. Wish I knew of this bag sooner. I would have gotten it sooner. And lots of room for my jackchi to sleep in all positions.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say this bag is not working out for my cat. He only weights 9 lbs but gets smooshed up in it. The bag is so soft my cat gets crushed down in the middle when I carry it. I put some hard plastic on the bottom, but it is not helping much at all, this bag is what it looks like in the photos. I would not recommend this bag, way to soft and offers no support at all. So sad, now I have to look for another cat carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma G.

customer_reviews.title: I think I may have ordered too small but it needs to fit on the plane...
customer_reviews.text: I am still not 100% sure about the size I ordered BUT that being said it seems sturdy, comfortable to hold and also will be comfortable for the puppy... I wish I had paid attention to the top not opening, so I have to put the pup in from the side, I wanted her to be able to pop her head out the top while in the car or whenever she can. That is the only reason I am returning this item. Other than that it would be perfect! It's cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: SUPER WELL MADE & COZY!
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun to use - I got a new puppy and I was traveling to Iowa from Florida and worried about him crying under the seat the whole way. Nope! He got in and got cozy and slept the ENTIRE trip! I am so happy with the construction of it and how it fits on my suitcase handle or I can carry it over my shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: Tallulah

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is super sturdy, perfect size for a growing kitten, and very comfortable for over the shoulder carrying. Had several people ask about it in the vet's waiting room. It comes with a portable water/food dish which is also great. would buy again, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hobson

customer_reviews.title: no insert avail for purchase separately.
customer_reviews.text: Beware should anything happen to the insert. Even though it's machine-washable, there's no option to purchase a new insert like there is for competing products. I would recommend finding something similar offered by another vendor that offers inserts available for purchase separately. I emailed customer service about this and they weren't helpful too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The height (Southwest)
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God I was a little skeptical at first about buying this because I wasn’t sure it was gonna fit but it worked out perfect size height everything. It was for my Yorkie that weighs 3 1/2 pounds she’s four months old she loved it slept the whole way through. It was comfortable for me to carry her on around my neck not heavy and very Comfortable for her highly recommend. And I flew with it on Southwest hope this review helps
customer_reviews.author: Dawn O.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This is not as big as advertised. My 14 lb cat couldn’t fit in it. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: My Hateful Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Blessings to whoever made this product. My cat is a stinker and whenever I put her in cages in the past. She claws and chews on the cage and plastic. She meows the whole time...I'm talking non stop loud meowing. So I get this carrier and put her in. She mowed like twice and then layed down and curled up. It's so cozy and I love that I can either get her in face forward or scoot her in from the back. It doesnt swing as much as the old carrier when I'm walking with it. THANK YOU Pet Ami
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gondos

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Pet carriers have come a long way since the last time I bought a new one. I love that both sides and the top unzip on this - makes it so much easier to get my cat inside. Also really love that there are so many windows to look out and the little pocket to stuff papers in from the vet. The memory foam insert is a nice touch as well. Quite pleased overall and my cat is happier inside compared to our old one that required entry from the top and only had a window on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Referencegirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Travel
customer_reviews.text: We flew our two pups up from Louisiana to Maryland and not only was the carrier pet friendly, it was travel friendly as well! During our layover we were able to open the carrier and allow them to poke their heads out without jumping out because there is a tiny leash to attach them to to prevent that. We also used it as their kennel in the hotel and it comes with an attached collapsable bowl for food or water so there was no unpacking to give them water! I would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Two Pups on a Plane

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the hard pet crate we had been using. We travel by car a good bit and our cat is a rescue with high anxiety. My daughter can sit this on her lap when the cat cries and unzip the window to pet and comfort her. Also I really think the cat likes how much more she can see through the mesh. She does press her head against it to test if she can get out but she settles down and rides so much better in this carrier. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lissalye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect Carrier - Bella Loves it - and so do I
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is just absolutely wonderful - highly recommend - easy to carrier - great for puppy and easy for her to get used to - airline hardly took a second look - Outside pockets hold everything we need - inside is plenty of room and it is very sturdy to carry by hand or cross-body strap -The pink is just too pretty and everyone knows a little girl is traveling inside. Safe, Efficient and Pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Rev.Debra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft structured carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest carrier. It is not flimsy and doesn’t fold upon itself, but is obviously not as rigid as a plastic carrier since it is soft structured. The little fleece bed is cozy enough to add comfort while also having a low enough profile that it doesn’t take away space. And the sides are closed enough to feel safe with enough mesh for curious little pets to look out. We got this to pick up our new holland lop baby. And we could not possibly be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her new pet carrier for her baby Cola. It is big, comfortable with a little bed on the inside and a cute little water bowl attached outside of the carrier. The color was the perfect pink and it's made well! My daughter took her baby on a trip and he was so comfortable that he didn't cry or get upset. In fact, he slept for most of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia8898

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this carrier. It arrives flat but is easy to stand it up by bending the end panels a little. It's really sturdy and the padded bottom makes it work well as a "den" for my cat. I got the large size for my 15lb. cat, and it's roomy. I would think that it would be big enough for a large terrier. The seat belt loops are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Dodor

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Clip Broke Instantly and Only one Zipper Lock?
customer_reviews.text: There is soft bed on the inside that my cat loves and the bag is flexible so it can fit into tight spaces. Two complaints though: 1. The plastic fastener clip that holds the strap and the bag together broke the first time I picked it up. If this happened when I was walking around the city streets or on the train/subway platforms and it broke that could have been really dangerous. 2. There are two ends of the bag and only a zipper lock for one side...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good use
customer_reviews.text: Fits my five pound dog well! Travelled with Poochie from CA to FL, to and back. Bottom is very sturdy; top could be a bit floppy but I suppose that's a compromise you need to make in order for the carrier to be compact and flexible. Comes with a cute little name-thing so you can put the dog's name and your phone number. Nice pockets, one tiny that zips up where I could keep my poop bags, etc;. and another that fit a few little containers of dog food perfectly. Travelling with dogs is always a bit of a hassle/Pain in the Ass/stressful for the animal but generally very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, caves in when even a small cat is inside and you pick it up. So flimsy it has no center of balance when carrying. Cat is terrified in it. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: SaveWildlife

customer_reviews.title: Great for my two ferrets!
customer_reviews.text: One of the main features that made me purchase this travel carrier was the ability to lock the ends that open. This was purchased for my ferret(s) for when they go to the vet and it works perfectly! Ferrets are smart enough to learn/be able to open certain zippers, clasps, etc so this bag is perfect. I LOVE that the bottom bed portion can be removed to be washed or for better storage.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very see-through, my cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the because it has so many good reviews, and I liked the locks on the zippers. BUT it is a lot more see through than what you would think from the pictures. My cat refused to get in this carrier, while she usually tries to get into ANY bag or luggage. I do not know if it is because of the plastic smell or the fact that there is no privacy. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves it. He falls asleep nearly the moment I zip it closed. The carrier itself is well thought out in design. With with it's zip/slip pockets, placement of the seatbelt attachments etc. BUT there is one thing I wish that wasn't wrong with it... The top parallel ceiling, (of you will) supports collapse down into the carrier while it is in use. If my boy didn't love it so much, I would have returned it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: m3marin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These carriers did the job. The upside to the soft-sided construction is that they’re not bulky and are more comfortable for my cats to rest in. In our car, though, it was a challenge to loop the seatbelts around then without partially squishing the carriers and reducing space for the cats. Other than that, they seem to be nice lightweight carriers.
customer_reviews.author: K. Laurey

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I have one in blue for my male cat and I just purchased a pink one for my female. We use these to take them to the vet when they need their shots. They come with a little dish that folds and clips to the travel luggage. Only wish the dish came in pink but overall it is a great purchase if you have a pet this is a must for travel and emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. My cat is average size at about 8lbs. Not sure if my 14lb kitty would fit comfortably in this carrier but it worked for my Neela. It has little locks on the zippers so it doesn't accidentally unzip. stays flat when you carry it and seems decent quality. It also has a little side window you can unzip to pet you cat. Worked nicely in the car when she needed a little extra comfort. I've only used it once buy I have yet to put it away because my kitty keeps sleeping in it. I did get the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Cat Mobile Travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier!! It is very comfortable for the cat and is easy to get her into without her escaping. My only worry is that she's a chewer and I'm afraid if I used this on an airplane or a longer road trip, she'll chew her way out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: We sent it back, we originally bought this to transport our dog home after her surgery but if you try to leave the “door” open to it so you can see your dog, it collapses not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and great quality. They thought of everything I needed when I took my cat on her first plane ride.
customer_reviews.author: Songbirdbutler

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time and as described. High quality pet carrier, folds neatly and easily for storage. My one caveat would be that the carrier is slightly smaller than I envisioned; to be clear, this is not a claim that dimensions are not as described, just that I thought it would be roomier inside. If you have a larger cat or small dog, just do due diligence really matching the measurements given to the size of your pet. Again, it fits fine and seems really comfortable, it just doesn't have as much headroom as my guy is accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute, stylish traveling case. Purchased it for my daughter’s 2.5 lb Shitz Zsu puppy. The food/water bowl is a plus, nice and convenient. I am hopeful it will have the capacity to accommodate the dog for its lifetime; however, it already seems to be a little tight. (Note: the puppy is now 4 lbs.). She loves being inside, and she drags her toys in there to play.
customer_reviews.author: Delightful "D"

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Secure
customer_reviews.text: The bag didn't keep it's shape when I unpacked it, so I'm leaving it up and out overnight to see if that'll help. Zelda likes it, settled in and didn't want to come out. I like the clasps on the zippers in case your pet manages to unzip it, they won't be able to escape. The side opening let's Zelda poke her head out to investigate her surroundings and it comes with an identification tag for those traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Poodie

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold the shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to transport my kitten from one state to another , so it could meet airlines criteria, but unfortunately it didn't work well. Overall its pretty comfy and well designed inside but unfortunately it doesn't hold the shape at all. in order to keep your little one comfortable you need to pull the time every few minutes and then its falling again.
customer_reviews.author: Daria H.

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs who have never used a carrier before. They were leary at first but ultimately took to these very well during a week-long trip. They'll be flying in them soon and I have no worries about using this product for that purpose. I've left these open on the floor of our home and the dogs like to hang out and nap in them during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cox

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Pretty Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new (6 ish pound) Cavapoo puppy. Knowing she’ll grow out of it fairly soon I really couldn’t beat the price. The bag is exceptionally cute and unlike other reviews say, holds up quite well/ doesn’t ‘cave in’ on my puppy. The bottom isn’t super sturdy so when we’re walking she does tend to slide down to one side, but she loves poking her head out of the little window and seems comfortable enough. My puppy is really playful and prefers to play with the zippers and tags on the bag rather than hang out in it, but overall it’s great quality and I’m happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Orkney

customer_reviews.title: Portable Car Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This particuar size I thought was small for my adult cat, but as soon as I put it on the floor, she went right in and curled up and took a nap. She likes it. But little does she know we are moving next week and she will be in it going to a new place. I chose the purple color , it's pretty. The fact it has varies zipper on a few sides on the bag is a plus. it even has a small one if your pet want to stick out their little head.
customer_reviews.author: HummingBird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for air travel
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this for local car travel for our newly adopted chiweenie. We also bought a small sized dog blanket to go inside. A day after we received it we had a family emergency that entailed a cross country flight. He did want to go in initially but with the small comfy blanket he fit perfectly and this carrier was perfect. There is a small side window that unzips to provide food or pets but our spry little guy would be halfway out that little opening so we didn’t use it. Loved the collapsible bowl. The hook broke the first time used but the bowl was great. Loved the outside storage pockets
customer_reviews.author: Martz

customer_reviews.title: Good size, but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a cross country flight with my 10 lb dog. Not very sturdy, and didn't hold it's shape well. I would suggest stuffing it with a blanket a few days before using so it doesn't cave in. The screened windows were nice so my dog could see everything going on, and could also stick her head out the side zipper. She fit well, and was able to turn around, stand up, and lay down. However, it didn't come with the collapsable food dish.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The top has no zipper
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you know the size of your puppy. My Shih Tzu is 8 lbs and about 15 inches long. She does fit in it but not much room. I was unhappy that the top didn't have a zipper. I couldn't tell in the description. I think it is a great little carrier other than that. I ended up not using it for my flight. I borrowed one from a neighbour. The company was johnny on the spot getting it to me. That was great too. I haven't complained. The error was mine.
customer_reviews.author: cre8ivcass

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong on the sides, it folded in on our dog too much. She could barely move around because it wouldn't stay open. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradrod

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it's shape when zipped up.
customer_reviews.text: I use this carrier to take my kittens back and forth to the vet or to the pet sitters. My daughter in law liked it so much, I bought her one for a thank you gift. I love that the zippers buckle to prevent escape. I find it very sturdy. I’m confident that it could handle my 8.5 lb Yorkie if I ever decide to fly with him.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Mary Margaret of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: I love that this has pockets for storage and the clips ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 week old kitten who is now 14 weeks and still has plenty of room. I love that this has pockets for storage and the clips for buckling her into a car seat. My least favorite feature is that one side tends to buckle in really easily, but she’s so small it doesn’t obstruct her and make her uncomfortable. When she gets to be full grown I will probably have to purchase a larger carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold shape!
customer_reviews.text: Really annoying because it does not hold its shape - and my kitties feel like it is collapsing in on them. They hate it. I should have realized this was going to be a problem when I first got it, since it was already having trouble when I first unfolded it. This is definitely not worth the money - I paid a little more for this one thinking it would be better than the cheaper soft sided carriers - which maybe material-wise it is, but it definitely needs better structure!
customer_reviews.author: j9a8m7i6e

customer_reviews.title: inside tether not very secure
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a nice carrier. The peek-a-boo window is nice idea (as long as your pup cannot fit through it) The inside tether to attach to the dog/cat collar is fairly thin. It became frayed and only hung on by a few threads. If this was sewn in better than it would be a great!
customer_reviews.author: Ttshutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Great in the car.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for our havanese poodle pup. It’s lightweight and sturdy. I love that you can belt it into the seat in the car. She’s gone for four rides already and is very comfortable. I have not taken it on a plane yet but it should work out when she’s older. The zippers are a little stiff so far. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase went for larger one as well.
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend. Very sturdy, purchased smaller one first, loved so much with a growing pup went for the larger one too. Perfect for puppy/smaller dog. Mine is now about 10lbs at 9 months and great for travel, especially car trips, keeps him safe. Side pocket great for collapsing bowl and some treats for the road. Insert easily removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Bellafoxie

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cat, don’t know about large cats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is fairly small, so she fits well. I can imagine it would be a big struggle for a large cat. But it is a nice carrier. My cat loves to lay in it at home if I have the zippers open I find her in it sometimes. I like the size and mostly bought it as an emergency carrier for if we have to leave the apartment quickly. It collapses which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality one
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay up / formed in dome shape.... even when shaped and stuffed to try and help maintain shape. Very cute but not sensible.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Carrier!!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this large carrier. It’s a great size for my average size Manx cat. It’s very durable yet lightweight, and it’s collapsible for storage. It holds its shape very well when it’s not collapsed. It has also held to my cat clawing the crap out of it trying to get out (he’s still learning about traveling). He now goes in it and lays down out of his own free will when we’re home. He has plenty of head room and enough room to turn around and lay down in as well. Excellent product. And you can’t beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great traveler
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile for my pup to get used to it, but I love it. My favorite part is definitely the seat belt features. I can put my dog in it and buckle her in for safety during long car rides. I also like how the bottom is lined. It is very soft and comfortable for my pup. She's a 6lb doxie and can stand up or sit down inside the traveler. She particularly enjoys being able to see me from any side of the traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves this
customer_reviews.text: Having had the hard cat carriers before, I love the new fabric one and so does my kitten. I have a bed for her, but she prefers to sleep in her carrier. (I brought her home in it, so maybe she connected with it first?) My only complaint is not functional because it scores a 5 in that area, but the color is not pink, it is more salmon, which is an orangey -pink which I do not like.
customer_reviews.author: carla morgan

customer_reviews.title: great bag great price
customer_reviews.text: well made, good price, absolutely a good product. I have the gray and the material sis somewhat reflective , which I like. good pet traveling bag. My dog is 10l bs and my cat is 5 lbs and they both fit in the bag comfortably whenever I need to take either of them to the vet or on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Happy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My Shihtzu puppy loves it! Sturdy and has lots of ventilation netting, helps you see your pet more. Has pockets on side for necessities, like water bottle and snacks . It comes with a calapsible cup . It also has a great pad inside, for comfort! She travels happy and comfortably ❣️
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great way to take my 4 month old 8lb puppy with me where ever I go. He likes being in the bag and it’s a great way to introduce him to new places. The top collapses somewhat on him in use, but it’s not a major issue. The only huge down side is the shoulders strap, which is way too narrow and has absolutely no passing whatsoever. I can’t imagine carrying a 15lb dog in considering the shoulder pains I have already. I’ve ordered a new more ergonomic strap and will update this review if it makes a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute with safety features at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is a esthetically pleasing, just as described and durably. My pup was very happy traveling in this when she was a puppy. I received many compliments from people. I loved the fact that it can be secured with a seat belt while in an automobile. The price point was great too. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fairyelf

customer_reviews.title: Good design, well built, love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for several months now and it's a great buy. Not only have we used it as a car carrier but leave it out for him to play and sleep in. This way geting him to go in when we go somewhere is cake. It still looks like new, washable bottem is great. So far we have loved it and best of all are cat does to, all the screen Windows give him plenty of fresh air and viewing area.
customer_reviews.author: Nutsnbolts24

customer_reviews.title: Travel home...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a nice carrier for my kitten, Rocky... saw them in the pet stores for outrageous prices, found this on Amazon...the quality is fabulous, delivery was immediate and the price was 1/2 of what I would have paid in the store...Big enough to carry comfortably, roomy enough for Rocky and looks great...if you need a carrier, try this, you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: FRAGIL, zippers break in first use
customer_reviews.text: The carrier broke on me while going through security at the airport on christmas eve (first time using it) so chaotic and the zipper just broke. Had to buy a new one and couldnt pass two carriers through the airport so had to throw it away no way of sending it back. Completely waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Garzon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I foster cats so I’m constantly transporting them in and out of cages. This case looked much more comfortable so I gave it a try. A lot more sturdy than I thought it would be, which is awesome. It won’t lose shape and offers protection to the animals. Also very roomy, cats were not crammed in and the mesh made it so they could all look out if they wanted. It is a bit bulky so if you have lightweight or small animals in here you have to move slowly so they don’t swing around inside. Didn’t come with the keychains as advertised but no biggie it does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: When I got this in the mail I was so surprised how big it was. I actually had a vet appt. for my cat, LuLu to recheck her for a surgery she recently had. LuLu LOVED it so much, she was able to see out of all sides and she was so much more relaxed when she was in this pet carrier. LuLu usually pees in her old carrier I had so I was worried that she would do it again, BUT she actually didn't pee she was to busy looking around! Definitely recommend this pet carrier especially if you have pets that get very nervous when they go in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Dont put a puppy in it!
customer_reviews.text: Not puppy bite proof! She bite through a good size whole. And here I thought it was puppy proof! To big to fit under airline seat! Cheaply made in my opinion after two flights it’s ready for the trash... bad buy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to take my small 2 pound mini rabbit with me on a very long car trip. He was so comfortable and was able to sleep most of the ride. Even after getting home he loves to sit in the carrier when I’m getting ready to take him for another adventure. Very easy for me to carry around and not stress him out more when he is stressed. He loves going places with him he gets so excited when he’s able to see new places
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: the only negative thing that happened was that the long handle to put over shoulders broke because the links are plastic. Will attempt to replace them with metal ones. I can fit my toy poodle and small chihuahua inside without any difficulty. Very comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Neumifly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pet Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this pet carrier. My daughter's 6 month old kitten needed a check-up at the Vet. We purchased the carrier the week before the appointment we left the carrier open on the floor with a few of the kitten's favorite toys. The kitten loved it and played with the carrier walking in and out of it all week. The carrier fit perfectly into the car seat belts and the kitten felt very secure. It was perfect for what we needed and it is very pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: AGP

product_meta.title: PetAmi Premium Airline Approved Soft-Sided Pet Travel Carrier | Ventilated, Comfortable Design with Safety Features | Ideal for Small to Medium Sized Cats, Dogs, and Pets
feature_bullets: Designed for the best and most convenient travel experience for you and your cat, dog, and pet! Measures approximately 19.5x10.2x12 inches (LxWxH), Fits most small/medium sized cat, dog, and pet. Before purchasing please measure your pet - LENGTH: neck to base of tail; HEIGHT: floor to top of shoulder

YOUR PET WILL TRAVEL IN COMFORT – Well ventilated design for optimal airflow and checking on pet, soft cozy sherpa lining bedding so your pet can relax and rest, collapsible bowl to keep your pet hydrated during travel.

DESIGNED WITH SAFETY IN MIND – The bag comes with safety buckle zippers and safety strap to prevent escape. Furthermore, the carrier can be strapped to car seat or luggage to ensure safety of your pet throughout travel.

EASY TO USE – This Airline Approved carrier bag is the perfect carry on; Easy identification name tag, two sided access, side zipper opening, and detachable strap make this the most convenient pet carrier bag for your travels.
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made with durable high grade polyester; Available in 6 Colors and 2 Sizes - Large, Small

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
